segments.text: I feel so bad for that woman, she's going to have such a mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her poor feet are getting all wet, and she's just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could help her, but I don't want to startle her or anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble, they're just trying to have a little fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he's struggling to keep his balance on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so worried for them, I hope they don't fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all just so sad, everyone is going to end up getting hurt or in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish there was something I could do to make it all better.
segments.speaker: PAR
